name: Block Bouncer: Simple Arcade Game
description:
Block Bouncer: simple, light, fun and addictive platform game. A one-tap block bouncer game! Show your ability!
Enjoy beautiful graphic, challenge friends and share the best scores!

Special Features
Multiplayer! - show your skills
Challenge Friends - share your score online!
Achievements - unlock new levels!
Gameplay Statistics - climb the leader board and be the best

Block Bouncer is completely free to play! Enjoy!

Hello Bouncers! Biggest present for you all! A lot of new features:
• Multiplayer! 
• Custom Leaderboards
• Challenge Friends
• Achievements
• Gameplay Statistics
• Share Scores to Facebook and Twitter
• Encouraging Messages
• Clever Notifications
Thanks for you support and keep on giving us those amazing five stars rates!
